```{r txt01, eval=TRUE}

   # --------------------------------------------------------------------------

renderPlot({
  
  d <- r3()$d
  d <- data.frame(d)
  n <- input$n
  # --------------------------------------------------------------------------

  # color dots randomly
   if(input$perc) {
      d$r <- sample(1:2, n, prob=c(.4,.6), replace=TRUE)
   }

  #~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

     my_colors <- c("pink","palegreen")
  
     d$r <- factor(d$r)
  
  #~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     
   A <- ggplot(data=d, aes(x=x, y=y, group=x)) +
     
    geom_boxplot(aes(  x=x, y=y), 
                 width=0.2, outlier.shape = NA, fill=my_colors) +

    geom_point(aes(x=xj, col=r), size=4, alpha=1) +
      scale_color_manual(values = c("1" = "purple", "2" = "red")) + 
     
    xlab("        ") + 
    ylab("Response") + 
     
    scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(1,2), 
                       labels=c("Group 1", "Group 2"), limits=c(0.5, 2.5) ) +
      
     theme_bw() + 
    theme(legend.position = "none") 
        
   #~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

  print(A)
  
  })
  # --------------------------------------------------------------------------


```


```{r, generate.data}
 
     # --------------------------------------------------------------------------
   
    r1 <- reactive({
      
        # Dummy line to trigger off button-press
        foo <- input$resample
             
        mu0 <-    input$mu0
        mu1 <-    input$mu0 + input$eff.p
        n   <-    input$n
        sd. <-    input$sd.
        
        g1 <- rnorm(n,mu0, sd.)
        g2 <- rnorm(n,mu1, sd.)
    
    return(list(g1=g1, g2=g2, sd.=sd.))
    
    })
   
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------------

  r2 <- reactive({
 
     sample <- r1()
     
     n   <- input$n
     sd. <- sample$sd.  
     g1  <- sample$g1       
     g2  <- sample$g2 
     
     d <- data.frame(
                  y =  c(g1, g2), 
                  x =  rep(c(1,2), each=n),
                  id = factor(rep(1:n, 2)) ,
                  r = 1
                  )
 
    return(list(d=d))
     
  })
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------------

  # isolate jitter
  r3 <- reactive({
 
     d <- r2()$d
     
     d$xj <- jitter(d$x, amount=.13)
     
    return(list(d=d))
     
  })

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------------


```
